GSD.description:
mmc: host: Return an error when ->enable_sdio_irq() ops is missing

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.110 by commit 2412a5d29411d404698a15cd2f2b965afd57acd6. For more details please see the references link.
